packagegui.name: brocontrol
packagegui.title: Bro NSM: BroControl Settings

field.description: Recipient address for all emails sent out by Bro and BroControl.
Mail connection summary reports each log rotation interval. A value of 1 means mail connection summaries, and a value of 0 means do not mail connection summaries.

Percentage of minimum disk space available before warning is mailed.
A value of 0 disables this feature.

Enable sending mail when broctl cron notices the availability of a host in the cluster to have changed.
A value of 1 means send mail when a host status changes, and a value of 0 means do not send mail.

The frequency of log rotation in seconds for the manager/standalone node (zero to disable rotation).
A value of 0 disables log rotation.
Number of days log files are kept (zero means log files never expire).

Enable BroControl to write statistics to the stats.log file.
A value of 1 means write to stats.log, and a value of 0 means do not write to stats.log.

Number of days that entries in the stats.log file are kept.
A value of 0 means that entries never expire.

Location of the log directory where log files will be archived each rotation interval
Default: /usr/local/logs
